chemaxon.marvin.modules
Interface MoleculeIterators.AtomPropertyInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomProperty.MoleculeAtomProperty, MacroMolecule.Polymer.AtomProperty
Enclosing interface:
MoleculeIterators
public static interface MoleculeIterators.AtomPropertyInterface

This class provides a uniform interface to access atom properties of various molecules. Since Molecule and MacroMolecule (and its components) neither have a common base class nor implement the same interface (for hystorical reasons not detailed here) an alternative approach to access these two kinds of molecules' atoms had to be imlemented.
Atoms can be accessed by their index returned by the corresponding AtomIteratorInterface.

partial charge

getResidueTypeId

public int getResidueTypeId(int atomIndex)
Gets the residue type of the specified atom. It the corresponding molecule is not a macromolecule (protein or nucleic acid chain) the atom is not part of a residue, thus it has no residue type. The returned value is chemaxon.marvin.modules.PDBResidues.UNKNOWN_RESIDUE_TYPE_ID.

Parameters:
atomIndex -
Returns:
internal residue type index
See Also:
PDBResidues
